name: Test GET /api/v1/employees endpoint with bad request
description: This test verifies that the API returns a proper error code when sending bad request
descriptionHtml: This test verifies that the API returns a proper error code when sending bad request

testStage.description: This test verifies that the API returns a proper error code when sending bad request
